attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In these dark economic times we need to find ways to improve the nation's productivity. One of the things that harms productivity is Lotus Notes.
We would like the government to take action and force companies to use email systems that are built for people.

Overall we feel that life without Lotus Notes will be better than our current situation.
The UK will benefit from a competitive edge since we would be the only country free from the system.

Programs exist that will allow other email clients to work with the Lotus Server. Therefore it will not impose a huge burden on businesses.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
